mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REV (SEQ_REV, SEQ_SLE, SEQ_CST, CONTENTS, RATING, DT_REG) VALUES (#{seq_rev}, #{seq_sle}, #{seq_cst}, #{contents}, #{rating}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REV tb_rev INNER JOIN TB_SLE tb_sle ON tb_rev.SEQ_SLE = tb_sle.SEQ_SLE WHERE tb_rev.SEQ_CST = #{register}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BUY_DTL SET CD_STATE_REV = 'Y' WHERE SEQ_BUY_DTL = #{seq_buy_dtl}
